titles.title: To provide for annual observances of certain legal public holidays on their traditional dates.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 5/26/1993--Introduced. Redesignates the legal public holidays of the Birthday of Martin Luther King, Jr., as January 15, Washington's Birthday as February 22, Memorial Day as May 30, and Columbus Day as October 12.
